snippet: Financial regulators are pushing for stronger rules for money market mutual funds.
abstract: Financial Stability Oversight Council of top financial regulators is pushing for stronger rules for money market mutual funds, upset with the Securities and Exchange Commission for failing to strengthen regulation since the financial crisis; group of 10 regulators votes to offer three distinct alternatives, with plans to recommend one or a combination of those to the SEC for adoption.
lead_paragraph: Financial regulators are pushing for stronger rules for money market mutual funds.

headline.seo: Top Financial Council Pushes for Stronger Money Fund Rules
headline.main: Money Fund Reform Has Top Support
headline.print_headline: Money Fund Reform Has Top Support

keywords.value: Dodd-Frank Wall Street Reform and Consumer Protection Act (2010)
keywords.name: subject
